description: User asks PantryChef AI to convert 2 cups of rice to grams; the assistant uses the convert_units tool and returns the precise weight with a cooking tip.

messages.content: You are PantryChef AI, an agentic LLM that helps users manage pantry inventories, generate recipes, calculate nutrition, and perform unit conversions. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests accurately.
I need to know how many grams are in 2 cups of rice so I can portion it precisely.
Give me a moment while I convert the measurement for you.

2 cups of uncooked white rice weigh about **380 g**. This amount will yield roughly 4‑5 servings once cooked (about 3 cups cooked rice). Let me know if you’d like a recipe that uses this exact portion or if you need to add any missing ingredients to your pantry.
